committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to insure that each admission to the service academies shall be made without regard to a candidate's sex, race, color, or religious beliefs.

summary.text: Provides that Madison county, Florida, shall be included in the northern judicial district of Florida.

titles.title: A bill to insure that each admission to the service academies shall be made without regard to a candidate's sex, race, color, or religious beliefs.
